title: Mastering React.js: From Beginner to Advanced
description: Learn React.js, one of the most popular JavaScript libraries for building modern web applications, with this comprehensive course.

lessons.title: Introduction to React.js
notes: Components are the building blocks of a React app

lessons.title: JSX and Components
notes: JSX is a syntax extension for JavaScript
Components can be functional or class-based

lessons.title: State and Props in React
notes: State is managed within a component
Props are used to pass data between components

lessons.title: Using Context for State Management
notes: Context provides a way to pass data through the component tree
Use Context for global state management
